42 #ifndef TEUCHOS_ARRAY_VIEW_HPP
43 #define TEUCHOS_ARRAY_VIEW_HPP

54 // Constructors/Destructors
55 
56 
57 template<class T> inline
58 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView( ENull )
59  :ptr_(0), size_(0)
60 {
61  setUpIterators();
62 }
63 
64 
65 template<class T> inline
66 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView( T* p, size_type size_in, const ERCPNodeLookup rcpNodeLookup )
67  :ptr_(p), size_(size_in)
68 {
69 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
70  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT( p != 0 && size_in <= 0 );
71  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPT( p == 0 && size_in != 0 );
72  setUpIterators(rcpNodeLookup);
73 #endif
74 }
75 
76 
77 template<class T> inline
78 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView(const ArrayView<T>& array)
79  :ptr_(array.ptr_), size_(array.size_)
80 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
81  ,arcp_(array.arcp_)
82 #endif
83 {}
84 
85 
86 template<class T> inline
87 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView(
88  std::vector<typename ConstTypeTraits<T>::NonConstType>& vec
89  )
90  : ptr_( vec.empty() ? 0 : &vec[0] ), size_(vec.size())
91 {
92  setUpIterators();
93 }
94 
95 
96 template<class T> inline
97 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView(
98  const std::vector<typename ConstTypeTraits<T>::NonConstType>& vec
99  )
100  : ptr_( vec.empty() ? 0 : &vec[0] ), size_(vec.size())
101 {
102  setUpIterators();
103 }

106 template<class T> inline
107 ArrayView<T>& ArrayView<T>::operator=(const ArrayView<T>& array)
108 {
109  ptr_ = array.ptr_;
110  size_ = array.size_;
111 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
112  arcp_ = array.arcp_;
113 #endif
114  return *this;
115 }

117 
118 template<class T> inline
119 ArrayView<T>::~ArrayView()
120 {}

123 // General query functions
124 
125 
126 template<class T>
127 inline
128 bool ArrayView<T>::is_null() const
129 {
130  return ptr_ == 0;
131 }
132 
133 
134 template<class T> inline
135 typename ArrayView<T>::size_type ArrayView<T>::size() const
136 {
137  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
138  return size_;
139 }
140 
141 
142 template<typename T>
143 std::string ArrayView<T>::toString() const
144 {
145 
146  using Teuchos::as;
147  std::ostringstream ss;
148 
149  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
150 
151  ss << "{";
152  for (size_type i = 0; i < size (); ++i) {
153  // NOTE: This depends on std::ostream::operator<<(const T&).
154  ss << operator[] (i);
155  if (i + 1 < size ()) {
156  ss << ", ";
157  }
158  }
159  ss << "}";
160  return ss.str ();
161 }

164 // Specialization for float. We use sufficient precision that no
165 // digits are lost after writing to string and reading back in again.
166 template<>
167 TEUCHOS_LIB_DLL_EXPORT std::string
168 ArrayView<float>::toString() const;

170 // Specialization for (const) float. We use sufficient precision that no
171 // digits are lost after writing to string and reading back in again.
172 template<>
173 TEUCHOS_LIB_DLL_EXPORT std::string
174 ArrayView<const float>::toString() const;

176 // Specialization for double. We use sufficient precision that no
177 // digits are lost after writing to string and reading back in again.
178 template<>
179 TEUCHOS_LIB_DLL_EXPORT std::string
180 ArrayView<double>::toString() const;

182 // Specialization for (const) double. We use sufficient precision that no
183 // digits are lost after writing to string and reading back in again.
184 template<>
185 TEUCHOS_LIB_DLL_EXPORT std::string
186 ArrayView<const double>::toString() const;

189 // Element Access Functions
190 
191 
192 template<class T> inline
193 T* ArrayView<T>::getRawPtr() const
194 {
195  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
196  return ptr_;
197 }
198 
199 
200 template<class T> inline
201 T& ArrayView<T>::operator[](size_type i) const
202 {
203  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
204  debug_assert_in_range(i,1);
205  return ptr_[i];
206 }
207 
208 
209 template<class T> inline
210 T& ArrayView<T>::front() const
211 {
212  debug_assert_not_null();
213  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
214  return *ptr_;
215 }
216 
217 
218 template<class T> inline
219 T& ArrayView<T>::back() const
220 {
221  debug_assert_not_null();
222  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
223  return *(ptr_+size_-1);
224 }
225 
226 
227 // Views
228 
229 
230 template<class T> inline
231 ArrayView<T> ArrayView<T>::view(size_type offset, size_type size_in) const
232 {
233  if (size_in == 0) {
234  return null;
235  }
236  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
237  debug_assert_in_range(offset, size_in);
238 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
239  return arcp_(offset, size_in);
240 #endif
241  return ArrayView<T>(ptr_+offset, size_in);
242  // WARNING: The above code had better be correct since we are using raw
243  // pointer arithmetic!
244 }
245 
246 
247 template<class T> inline
248 ArrayView<T> ArrayView<T>::operator()(size_type offset, size_type size_in) const
249 {
250  return view(offset, size_in);
251 }
252 
253 
254 template<class T> inline
255 const ArrayView<T>& ArrayView<T>::operator()() const
256 {
257  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
258  return *this;
259 }
260 
261 
262 template<class T> inline
263 ArrayView<const T> ArrayView<T>::getConst() const
264 {
265  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
266 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
267  return arcp_.getConst()();
268 #endif
269  return ArrayView<const T>(ptr_, size_);
270 }
271 
272 
273 template<class T> inline
274 ArrayView<T>::operator ArrayView<const T>() const
275 {
276  return getConst();
277 }
278 
279 
280 // Assignment
281 
282 
283 template<class T>
284 void ArrayView<T>::assign(const ArrayView<const T>& array) const
285 {
286  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
287  debug_assert_not_null();
288  if (this->getRawPtr()==array.getRawPtr() && this->size()==array.size())
289  return; // Assignment to self
290  debug_assert_in_range(0,array.size());
291  std::copy( array.begin(), array.end(), this->begin() );
292  // Note: Above, in debug mode, the iterators are range checked! In
293  // optimized mode, these are raw pointers which should run very fast!
294 }
295 
296 
297 // Standard Container-Like Functions
298 
299 
300 template<class T>
301 typename ArrayView<T>::iterator ArrayView<T>::begin() const
302 {
303  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
304 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
305  return arcp_.create_weak();
306 #else
307  return ptr_;
308 #endif
309 }
310 
311 
312 template<class T>
313 typename ArrayView<T>::iterator ArrayView<T>::end() const
314 {
315  debug_assert_valid_ptr();
316 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
317  return arcp_.create_weak() + size_;
318 #else
319  return ptr_ + size_;
320 #endif
321 }
322 
323 
324 // Assertion Functions.
325 
326 
327 template<class T>
328 const ArrayView<T>& ArrayView<T>::assert_not_null() const
329 {
330  if(!ptr_)
331  throw_null_ptr_error(typeName(*this));
332  return *this;
333 }
334 
335 
336 template<class T>
337 const ArrayView<T>&
338 ArrayView<T>::assert_in_range(size_type offset, size_type size_in) const
339 {
340  assert_not_null();
341  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION( size_in == as<size_type>(0), RangeError,
342  "Error, size=0 is not allowed!" );
343  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
344  !(
345  ( 0 <= offset && offset+size_in <= this->size() )
346  &&
347  size_in >= 0
348  ),
349  RangeError,
350  typeName(*this)<<"::assert_in_range():"
351  " Error, [offset,offset+size) = ["<<offset<<","<<(offset+size_in)<<")"
352  " does not lie in the range [0,"<<this->size()<<")!"
353  );
354  return*this;
355 }

358 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
359 
360 template<class T>
361 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView( const ArrayRCP<T> &arcp )
362  : ptr_(arcp.getRawPtr()), size_(arcp.size()), arcp_(arcp)
363 {}
364 
365 
366 template<class T>
367 ArrayView<T>::ArrayView(T* p, size_type size_in, const ArrayRCP<T> &arcp)
368  : ptr_(p), size_(size_in), arcp_(arcp)
369 {}
370 
371 
372 #endif // HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK

375 // private
376 
377 
378 template<class T>
379 void ArrayView<T>::setUpIterators(const ERCPNodeLookup rcpNodeLookup)
380 {
381 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
382  if (ptr_ && arcp_.is_null()) {
383  arcp_ = ArrayRCP<T>(ptr_, 0, size_, false, rcpNodeLookup);
384  }
385 #endif
386 }

396 
397 template<class T> inline
398 Teuchos::ArrayView<T>
399 Teuchos::arrayView( T* p, typename ArrayView<T>::size_type size )
400 {
401  if (size == 0)
402  return null;
403  return ArrayView<T>(p, size);
404 }
405 
406 
407 template<class T> inline
408 Teuchos::ArrayView<T> Teuchos::arrayViewFromVector( std::vector<T>& vec )
409 {
410  if (vec.size() == 0)
411  return null;
412  return ArrayView<T>(vec);
413 }
414 
415 
416 template<class T> inline
417 Teuchos::ArrayView<const T> Teuchos::arrayViewFromVector( const std::vector<T>& vec )
418 {
419  if (vec.size() == 0)
420  return null;
421  return ArrayView<const T>(vec);
422 }

427 template<class T> inline
428 std::vector<T> Teuchos::createVector( const ArrayView<T> &av )
429 {
430  std::vector<T> v(av.begin(), av.end());
431  return v;
432 }
433 
434 #endif // __sun

437 template<class T> inline
438 std::vector<T> Teuchos::createVector( const ArrayView<const T> &av )
439 {
440  std::vector<T> v(av.begin(), av.end());
441  return v;
442 }

446 bool Teuchos::is_null( const ArrayView<T> &av )
447 {
448  return av.is_null();
449 }

452 template<class T> inline
453 bool Teuchos::nonnull( const ArrayView<T> &av )
454 {
455  return !av.is_null();

459 template<class T>
460 std::ostream& Teuchos::operator<<( std::ostream& out, const ArrayView<T>& p )
461 {
462  return out << p.toString();

466 template<class T2, class T1>
467 REFCOUNTPTR_INLINE
468 Teuchos::ArrayView<T2>
469 Teuchos::av_const_cast(const ArrayView<T1>& p1)
470 {
471  T2 *ptr2 = const_cast<T2*>(p1.getRawPtr());
472  return ArrayView<T2>(ptr2, p1.size());
473  // Note: Above is just fine even if p1.get()==NULL!
474 }
475 
476 
477 template<class T2, class T1>
478 REFCOUNTPTR_INLINE
479 Teuchos::ArrayView<T2>
480 Teuchos::av_reinterpret_cast(const ArrayView<T1>& p1)
481 {
482  typedef typename ArrayView<T1>::size_type size_type;
483  const int sizeOfT1 = sizeof(T1);
484  const int sizeOfT2 = sizeof(T2);
485  size_type size2 = (p1.size()*sizeOfT1) / sizeOfT2;
486  T2 *ptr2 = reinterpret_cast<T2*>(p1.getRawPtr());
487  return ArrayView<T2>(
488  ptr2, size2
489 #ifdef HAVE_TEUCHOS_ARRAY_BOUNDSCHECK
490  ,arcp_reinterpret_cast<T2>(p1.access_private_arcp())
491 #endif
492  );
493  // Note: Above is just fine even if p1.get()==NULL!
494 }
